model_answer: The preceding actions that most directly caused the discovery of the TV were (A) Successfully registering the TV in SmartThings by entering the on-screen PIN and naming it (event 4), and (D) Starting Alexaâ€™s device scan by tapping "Discover Devices" (event 9).
